name: Enya (Little Fire)
description:
This game was made for the TriJam - where you have 3 hours to develop a game.

Instructions are in game. Controls are simply WSAD or the arrow keys.

This was the first game jam where I actually had to plan ahead. I sketched and wrote pseudo code.  Who would have thought planning ahead would have made making a game in under 3 hours possible! I spent 1 day on and off just thinking about what I could make.  It was really nice to be in a jam and it not control my whole weekend. 

I had heaps of fun with this.  I made all the graphics and code in the jam by myself - in total it took me 2hrs 54min.  

I had grand plans of water obstacles but obviously ran out of time.  

All SFX (...all 2 of them haha made by me) I reused from previous projects and the music is from freesound.org: https://freesound.org/people/mickleness/sounds/316975/
